title: Can you fix the bloody Watch Rewards already?
body:
Click log in > redirected to another log in screen > enter details>  redirected to 3 different League websites in an instant > log in complete > sent back to eSports site > sent to 3 League websites in an instant again > redirected to a page that says “You’ve been signed out. You will be automatically redirected.”

Return to the beginning of the cycle with +5 rage. Repeat. After reaching 100% rage bar, post a comment on League Boards about how garbage this site is.

replies.body: Good to hear those are still utterly busted.
